title: Thousand-Year Old Egg and Tofu Salad
ingredients: ['2 preserved duck eggs, shelled and cut into small cubes', '200g firm tofu, sliced into 2cm pieces', '2 tablespoons chopped coriander', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon Chinese black vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon sesame oil']
